title: Shop Bugs
body: Hey Guys, im trying to use the shop to buy some champs, but it wont let me click on anything in the shop, Any idea why? ive tried closing down and all the usual stuff but yeah

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try running through the "[Issues with the PvP.net store](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660-Issues-with-the-League-of-Legends-Store-PvP-Net-)" support article for me, let me know if anything helps.
